title: Back to School
description: "After the first week of school, things fell into a very ordinary routine. Kevin had practice every day after school and got home around five. For a while he showered and dressed at school, but I had really gotten used to those sweaty encounters after practice during the summer, so I convinced him to wait and share all that sweat and grime with me.." Watch Matt with his stepbrother going Back to School in the third book of the First Year series.
author: James Benedict Noble
